description:
While Usopp, Nami, and Chopper seek to unravel the secrets of the haunted mansion, Luffy and the gang do battle with an army of the undead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le mystère des zombies. Le labo cauchemardesque de Hogback !
The Zombie`s Secret! Hogback`s Nightmarish Laboratory!
Zombie no Nazo! Akumu no Hogback Kenkyuujo
ゾンビの謎! 悪夢のホグバック研究所
